title: Bishoujo Collection – AV Director Edition – An Application to Improve the Status and Develop the S*xual Skills of the Actresses - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Romance   Sci-fi
author: KyouKyou   キョウキョウ
description:
One day, Itou Yuki finds an unfamiliar app installed on his smartphone. Intrigued, he played around with the status of his friend, a woman, in the app.

Then, after a lot of trial and error, he saw how the app affected reality. He started to believe in the power of the app and decided to try a few things.

- He used it to train the women in his life and make them grow.
- He uses the power of apps in his work to succeed in many ways.

This is the story of a middle-aged man who makes a living by selling p*rn videos and earns money by shooting p*rn videos with women he has developed using apps.>
